redemption_instructions_by_platform.0: SHiFT codes can be redeemed for your SHiFT Account on the Gearbox SHiFT site, or via the in-game Social menu within Borderlands 4 at launch. If you don't have a SHiFT account, you can create one on the Gearbox SHiFT site! SHiFT accounts are free. Each code may be redeemed once (1) per SHiFT account.

1. Visit [the THRONE AND LIBERTY code redemption page](https://www.playthroneandliberty.com/en-us/community/code-redemption)  
2. Select your preferred platform and log in to your account  
3. Enter the code you received from the Discord Quest and hit "Redeem Reward."  

**Your reward will be available the next time you play THRONE AND LIBERTY**

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on earning an in-game reward for King of Meat! In order to claim it, follow these steps:

o        Visit the King of Meat Code Redemption Website.  
o        Select your preferred platform and log in to your account.  
o        Enter the code you received from the Discord Quest and hit "Redeem Reward".   You should see a confirmation message.  
o        The redeemed Item will appear in your inventory once you reach Contender Rank 2 in-game.  

**Reward Available: 10/7/2025 @ 10 AM PDT – 10/13/2025 @ 4:59 PM PDT **

Log in to redeem your code at: https://www.ea.com/games/battlefield/battlefield-6/redeem

1. Log in to your EA Account   
2. Redeem your in-game codes  
3. Link your platforms to your EA Account to play on any platform

How To Use Redeem Codes:  
1. Once you have a Redeem Code, head over to https://tinyurl.com/yzavuyet, sign up or create an account to redeem it!   
2. To proceed, you will need to go to your account, redeem your reward and copy/paste your Redeem Code.  
3. Once your code is successfully redeemed, the reward will be available in the full game once your link your PROS account in-game by scanning the QR Code.  

**Please note, the Redeem Code is valid from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC): October 16, 2025, 9:00:00 AM to October 23, 2025, 8:59:59 AM.**
